an8.25:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
an8.25:1.2: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahanamo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.25:1.4: “Yato kho, mahanama, buddham saranam gato hoti, dhammam saranam gato hoti, sangham saranam gato hoti;
an8.25:2.2: “Yato kho, mahanama, upasako panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, musavada pativirato hoti, suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti;
an8.25:2.3: ettavata kho, mahanama, upasako silava hoti”ti.
an8.25:3.1: “Kittavata pana, bhante, upasako attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya”ti?
an8.25:3.2: “Yato kho, mahanama, upasako attanava saddhasampanno hoti, no param saddhasampadaya samadapeti;
an8.25:3.3: attanava silasampanno hoti, no param silasampadaya samadapeti;
an8.25:3.4: attanava cagasampanno hoti, no param cagasampadaya samadapeti;
an8.25:3.5: attanava bhikkhunam dassanakamo hoti, no param bhikkhunam dassane samadapeti;
an8.25:3.6: attanava saddhammam sotukamo hoti, no param saddhammassavane samadapeti;
an8.25:3.7: attanava sutanam dhammanam dharanajatiko hoti, no param dhammadharanaya samadapeti;
an8.25:3.8: attanava sutanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhita hoti, no param atthupaparikkhaya samadapeti;
an8.25:3.9: attanava atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti, no param dhammanudhammappatipattiya samadapeti.
an8.25:3.10: Ettavata kho, mahanama, upasako attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya”ti.
an8.25:4.1: “Kittavata pana, bhante, upasako attahitaya ca patipanno hoti parahitaya ca”ti?
an8.25:4.2: “Yato kho, mahanama, upasako attana ca saddhasampanno hoti, paranca saddhasampadaya samadapeti;
an8.25:4.3: attana ca silasampanno hoti, paranca silasampadaya samadapeti;
an8.25:4.4: attana ca cagasampanno hoti, paranca cagasampadaya samadapeti;
an8.25:4.5: attana ca bhikkhunam dassanakamo hoti, paranca bhikkhunam dassane samadapeti;
an8.25:4.6: attana ca saddhammam sotukamo hoti, paranca saddhammassavane samadapeti;
an8.25:4.7: attana ca sutanam dhammanam dharanajatiko hoti, paranca dhammadharanaya samadapeti;
an8.25:4.8: attana ca sutanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhita hoti, paranca atthupaparikkhaya samadapeti,
an8.25:4.9: attana ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti, paranca dhammanudhammappatipattiya samadapeti.
an8.25:4.10: Ettavata kho, mahanama, upasako attahitaya ca patipanno hoti parahitaya ca”ti.
